item.title: 4 Hour Chef Key Lessons
item.description: Reference: 4 hour chef There are skills that we want to become better at. Be it coding, content creation or tennis. In 4 Hour Chef, Tim Ferriss offers a simple framework to help us approach mastery of skills. Deconstruction Breaking the skills into smaller components, and keep breaking them down until you are unable to go further. There, you will find the atomic skills. I call this the skill graph.
